show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 150 Stephen Hohenrieder on investing in mature food companies and help them go further and deeper
subtitle: 150 Stephen Hohenrieder on investing in mature food companies and help them go further and deeper
summary:
Stephen Hohenrieder, founder of Grounded Capital Partners, joins us to discuss a different approach to capital—by treating the symptoms of an unhealthy system rather than incentivizing them. 
---------------------------------------------------

Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits on www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag. 

Support our work:

  • Share it
  • Give a 5-star rating
  • Buy us a coffee… or a meal! www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture

----------------------------------------------------
What if the real scalable impact can be made in investing in mature, well-established, and trustable food companies? What if we can invest in these companies and enable them to go further and deeper? What kind of investment structure would make this possible? 

More about this episode on https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/stephen-hohenrieder.

Find our video course on https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/course.
